ygData.subject: RE: Psalm series of spells and some updates to the song list
ygData.msgSnippet: ... you dont need somebody no, but it helps if somebody else or another bard is chaining/ensnaring. We took on 4, counem 4 spectres with a lvl 39 pali, 39
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:00 PM 7/14/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>i've never even tried the psalms of warmth and cooling, but i will check
>them out tonight. get the level 40 song, so maybe you can tell us what it
>does, cause no one can see any discernible effects.
>
>Also with the fear song, you dont need someone to ensnare. Solo away with
>chain/fear twisting (dunno what word we are using now hehe).

you dont need somebody no, but it helps if somebody else or another bard is
chaining/ensnaring. We took on 4, counem 4 spectres with a lvl 39 pali, 39
bard, 40 bard, and a lvl 32 cleric :). I fear'd and keyana chained, we all
did bits of damage and the cleric covered the odd spectre or 2 that
resisted a fear once.

>
>And yes the Tuyen's and Fufil songs are single Target.
>

thats what i thought. bah. not really worth it then im thinking, especially
with how much they get resisted now.
